text: In 2020, for the second consecutive year, the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences neglected to nominate a woman for its Best Director award. The artist Malika Favre created this cover in response. https://t.co/smUFfQmgIS https://t.co/NT9HMFvw1v
